# Listening Practice Quiz

## Question 1
[audio:audio1_1.mp3]
What did you hear?
- German numbers
- German greetings ✓
- German food words
- German colors

## Question 2
Based on the audio, which phrase was spoken?
- Guten Morgen ✓
- Gute Nacht
- Auf Wiedersehen
- Wie geht's

This quiz tests your German listening comprehension skills.
